attributes.review: it took 3 months to download and once it downloaded some weird oompa loompa looking squished baby kept appearing on the screen and my cat was sitting in my lap watching and at the sight of the creature on the screen had a series of strokes and seizures and ended up splitting in half. thank fully she is still alive and both halves are still functional but we have to direct her back half around the house because it has no eyes. now i tried to continue to work the app but it made me violently sick every time the orange creature appeared and the whole app is just a waste of space.
attributes.title: this app almost killed my cat

attributes.review: When I first opened the app believe it or not, the annoying orange 🍊 came up.  I WAS SO SCARED.😔 He held a fist ✊to me. The screen said SIGN UP OR LOGIN. Like WHAT. Then it continued to harass me by asking if I wanted notifications?? No you do not have the right to send my personal device some virus. 🤢THERE’S A GLOBAL PANDEMIC HAPPENING.  I DON’T WANT TO BE SICK. SHAME ON YOU!!!! In conclusion, I will be deleting this app because no one should have it.  😾😾
attributes.title: Hurt my feelings!!!!😿😿

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the VERY SECOND I OPENED IT, it LAGGED... Then it glitched and suddenly CRASHED me out of the app. I decided to wait it off a bit and then around an hour later it gave me a notification that it would gave me a virus. I was very SHOCKED and like SHOOK. Donald Dump please fix your app😔 but I’m worried that it’s so TRASH you won’t be able to fix it✨So please delete yourself out of the office🥰🧚‍♀️✨ Trump 2020 OM a TOMBSTONE❤️🦋 ACAB, BLM
attributes.title: no maam❤️

attributes.review: When I first had gotten the app, it kept asking the same questions for me to log in. When I logged in, the app went crazy! The screen switched on and off and music started playing. Weird music too! Like the elevator type music. I used to support trump but now I don’t🤬🤬! Unreliable app, unreliable president!! Take this app off the market😡🍊!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app🌝 my iPhone 4 started glitching and makes me go into the app “Subway Surf”😍 and when i want to go back into the app it says “ReSpEcT oUr PrEsiDeNt”🤡 then when i throw my phone out the window it starts playing “shawtys like a melody in my head that i can’t keep out got me singing like na na na na everyday like my head stuck on replay”🧚‍♀️🥰😍
attributes.title: oh no-

attributes.review: after downloading the app i was disappointed to see that my entire phone shut down. i guess it was my fault for downloading such an ugly app, but i tried to work with it. after a few more times trying eventually it came on but i closed it once i saw donald trumps whack heavy set face. DO NOT RECOMMEND (also he’s racist so)
attributes.title: this app has BUGS🤮🤢🤮🤕

attributes.review: my kids got this app and i realized there was a glitch and shows some disturbing content.. it even asked my kids to k**l themselves. I’m not only scared for my children but i’m scared for other people!!! please help get rid of this ad shows bad things that kids should not be seeing at a young age if you know what i mean. scared for people😿. let’s do this america !
attributes.title: RATE THIS ONE STAR SO IT CAN BE TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE

attributes.review: I hate this app. Needless to say it made my eyes hurt so bad that one of my eyes has lost all of its sight! I thought this app was supposed to be for us to support trump but I can’t support someone who’s app made me half blind! Take this app down!! It’s also for stupid white supremacist people to support a rapist,child offender,sex trafficker orange orangutan🦧. Which is a disgrace to the orangutan community 😞.
attributes.title: I do not accept this!🤬😡

attributes.review: So I was going to get this app to support our “awesome”president, but it caused many unfortunate events in my life. It first took 5 hours to download and I have the best internet. Then it caused a major virus to spread to my phone. Also, the information made my mom pass out, which was very traumatic. This app needs to be removed NOW! My mom and I now need permanent therapy.
attributes.title: Worst app in the world

attributes.review: 100% do not recommend getting this app,, it took so long to download and I have plenty of storage and my WiFi is perfectly fine. When I was finally able to open the app it caused my phone to glitch out rlly badly,, on top of all of that the app was super glitchy and hard to navigate,, probably the worst app I have EVER downloaded
attributes.title: WORST APP DO NOT GET !!
